name: Razer Orochi Bluetooth Laser Mouse
Features: [Razer Precision 3G Laser sensor, Tracking up to 100 inches per second, Ambidextrous design, Razer Synapse On-board Memory, On-The-Fly Sensitivity adjustment, Zero-acoustic Ultraslick Teflon feet, Gold-plated USB connector, Wireless Mode, Gaming optimized Bluetooth 2.0 connectivity, Up to 2000DPI sensitivity, 125Hz polling/ 8ms response, Wired Mode, Detachable three foot, lightweight, braided micro-USB cord, Up to 4000DPI sensitivity, 1000Hz Ultrapolling/ 1ms response]
